segments.en: Numbered Discourses 4
6. Overflowing Merit
54. Living Together (2nd)
“Mendicants, there are four ways of living together.
What four?

segments.pli: Chavo chavāya saddhiṃ saṃvasati, chavo deviyā saddhiṃ saṃvasati, devo chavāya saddhiṃ saṃvasati, devo deviyā saddhiṃ saṃvasati.
segments.en:
1. A male zombie living with a female zombie;
  2. a male zombie living with a goddess;
  3. a god living with a female zombie;
  4. a god living with a goddess.

segments.pli: Kathañca, bhikkhave, chavo chavāya saddhiṃ saṃvasati.
segments.en: And how does a male zombie live with a female zombie?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, sāmiko hoti pāṇātipātī adinnādāyī kāmesumicchācārī musāvādī pisuṇavāco pharusavāco samphappalāpī abhijjhālu byāpannacitto micchādiṭṭhiko dussīlo pāpadhammo maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati akkosakaparibhāsako samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ;
segments.en: It’s when the husband kills living creatures, steals, commits sexual misconduct; he uses speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical; and he’s covetous, malicious, and has wrong view. He’s unethical, of bad character, living at home with his heart full of the stain of stinginess, abusing and insulting ascetics and brahmins.

segments.pli: bhariyāpissa hoti pāṇātipātinī adinnādāyinī kāmesumicchācārinī musāvādinī pisuṇavācā pharusavācā samphappalāpinī abhijjhālunī byāpannacittā micchādiṭṭhikā dussīlā pāpadhammā maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati akkosikaparibhāsikā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ.
segments.en: And the wife is also … unethical, of bad character …

segments.pli: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, chavo chavāya saddhiṃ saṃvasati.
segments.en: That’s how a male zombie lives with a female zombie.

segments.pli: Kathañca, bhikkhave, chavo deviyā saddhiṃ saṃvasati?
segments.en: And how does a male zombie live with a goddess?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, sāmiko hoti pāṇātipātī … pe … micchādiṭṭhiko dussīlo pāpadhammo maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati akkosakaparibhāsako samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ;
segments.en: It’s when the husband … is unethical, of bad character …

segments.pli: bhariyā khvassa hoti pāṇātipātā paṭiviratā adinnādānā paṭiviratā kāmesumicchācārā paṭiviratā musāvādā paṭiviratā pisuṇāya vācāya paṭiviratā pharusāya vācāya paṭiviratā samphappalāpā paṭiviratā anabhijjhālunī abyāpannacittā sammādiṭṭhikā sīlavatī kalyāṇadhammā vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati anakkosikaparibhāsikā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ.
segments.en: But the wife doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or use alcoholic drinks that cause negligence. She’s ethical, of good character, living at home with her heart rid of the stain of stinginess, not abusing and insulting ascetics and brahmins.

segments.pli: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, chavo deviyā saddhiṃ saṃvasati.
segments.en: That’s how a male zombie lives with a goddess.

segments.pli: Kathañca, bhikkhave, devo chavāya saddhiṃ saṃvasati?
segments.en: And how does a god live with a female zombie?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, sāmiko hoti pāṇātipātā paṭivirato adinnādānā paṭivirato kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato musāvādā paṭivirato pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato samphappalāpā paṭivirato anabhijjhālu abyāpannacitto sammādiṭṭhiko sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati anakkosakaparibhāsako samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ;
segments.en: It’s when the husband … is ethical, of good character …

segments.pli: bhariyā khvassa hoti pāṇātipātinī … pe … micchādiṭṭhikā dussīlā pāpadhammā maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati akkosikaparibhāsikā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ.
segments.en: But the wife … is unethical, of bad character …

segments.pli: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, devo chavāya saddhiṃ saṃvasati.
segments.en: That’s how a god lives with a female zombie.

segments.pli: Kathañca, bhikkhave, devo deviyā saddhiṃ saṃvasati?
segments.en: And how does a god live with a goddess?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, sāmiko hoti pāṇātipātā paṭivirato … pe … sammādiṭṭhiko sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati anakkosakaparibhāsako samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ;
segments.en: It’s when the husband … is ethical, of good character …

segments.pli: bhariyāpissa hoti pāṇātipātā paṭiviratā … pe … sammādiṭṭhikā sīlavatī kalyāṇadhammā vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati anakkosikaparibhāsikā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ.
segments.en: And the wife is also … ethical, of good character …

segments.pli: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, devo deviyā saddhiṃ saṃvasati.
segments.en: That’s how a god lives with a goddess.
These are the four ways of living together.” …
